titleStmt.title: A new and pleasaunt enterlude intituled the mariage of witte and science
titleStmt.author: Marbury, Francis, d. 1611, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, neare vnto sainct Dunstones churche by Thomas Marshe,
